translation.en: Are you a dangerous man?
The question first is whether I committed murder.
translation.fr: Demandez-moi plutôt si je suis un meurtrier.

translation.en: And did you?
The courts, they have decided... no.
translation.fr: Le tribunal a rendu son verdict en ma faveur.

translation.en: I have faced trials.
I have faced allegations.
And the courts, they have decided.
That doesn't answer my question, does it?
translation.fr: Vous ne répondez pas à la question.

translation.en: That's my answer.
There are those who would say you got away with it.
translation.fr: Certains iraient jusqu'à dire que vous avez échappé à la justice.

translation.en: That's what Time magazine said.
translation.fr: C'est ce que raconte le TIME.

translation.en: Perhaps it's true.
After all, I cannot now face trial...
translation.fr: Après tout, on ne peut plus me juger

translation.en: anywhere in the world.
- Time to party, girls. -
Come on.
Wait, wait, wait.
Alain!
This is Alain, who I was telling you about.
translation.fr: Voici Alain, dont je vous ai parlé.

translation.en: - Welcome to Kanit House. - Hello.
- Get them a drink, Ajay. - With pleasure.
Relax, we must take the fever down.
translation.fr: Repose-toi. Ça fera baisser la fièvre.

translation.en: I want to go home.
Our home is Bangkok,
but next summer we'll open offices in Paris and Zurich.
translation.fr: mais nous allons ouvrir des bureaux à Paris et Zurich.

translation.en: We have a network of couriers throughout Asia and Western Europe.
translation.fr: Nous avons des passeurs en Asie et en Europe occidentale.

translation.en: Which is how we are able to offer such attractive prices.
translation.fr: Voilà pourquoi nous pouvons vous proposer des prix aussi attractifs.

translation.en: - Sorry. - Oh, it's all right.
Who are you buying for?
Oh, I'm not really buying.
- You're Dutch? - Yes.
But not entirely kwailo, are you?
translation.fr: Mais pas un pur gweilo, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: You're like me.
Yeah. My father's from Indonesia.
Mine is Indian,
and my mama is from Vietnam.
But listen to me and I am French.
It can be confusing sometimes.
translation.fr: Il y a de quoi s'y perdre.

translation.en: - I'm Alain. - Willem.
- Wim. - My wife, Monique.
- Wim. - Don't you want to know the cost?
translation.fr: - Wim. - Vous voulez connaître le prix ?

translation.en: Okay, yeah.
That one.
Then you are buying for someone.
- Yeah. - What is her name?
- Lena. - Lena?
- Wow, is he a professional? - He is.
You're in very good hands.
translation.fr: Vous êtes entre de bonnes mains.

translation.en: - How much? -
If you'd like, I'm certain I can break him down to... this?
translation.fr: Je pourrais sûrement marchander et arriver à ce prix-là.

translation.en: Thank you. Sorry, I...
I should go. Sorry.
My friend?
How long have you been gone from home?
translation.fr: Vous êtes parti il y a longtemps ?

translation.en: - A year. - And you have not run out of money yet?
translation.fr: - Un an. - Et vous avez encore de l'argent ?

translation.en: No, we've been... sensible.
translation.fr: Disons que nous avons fait très attention.

translation.en: But still, you want to tell Lena that you love her.
translation.fr: Mais vous voulez montrer à Lena que vous l'aimez.

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
If I told you...
I could have you made a sapphire set in diamonds
translation.fr: de faire monter un saphir serti de diamants

translation.en: on a platinum ring for half the price I just showed you,
translation.fr: sur une bague en platine pour la moitié de ce prix,

translation.en: what would you say?
We didn't come out here for jewelry.
translation.fr: On n'est pas venus pour ça. FABRIQUÉ AUX PAYS-BAS

translation.en: That money could keep us going to Kathmandu, even Kabul.
translation.fr: Cet argent pourrait nous permettre d'atteindre Katmandou ou Kaboul.

translation.en: We've got to go home some time.
translation.fr: Il faudra bien rentrer un jour.

translation.en: - You want to go home? -
Just whatever's next for us.
translation.fr: Voyons ce qui s'offre à nous.

translation.en: An apartment?
A houseboat maybe.
Like an old married couple, then?
- An old married couple? -
- Hello, Wim. - Lena.
- Hi. - Hi.
Mon dieu! You're so pretty.
There's no obligation.
Try it on.
Still a lot of money.
We understand.
You do not need to decide now. Do they?
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas obligés de vous décider ce soir.

translation.en: Of course not.
We're going to see you in Bangkok, yes?
translation.fr: Vous viendrez nous voir à Bangkok ?

translation.en: Well, all right.
Are you sure it's okay for us to stay?
translation.fr: Vous êtes sûrs que ça ne vous dérange pas ?

translation.en: - Yes, of course it is. - Our home is always open to friends.
translation.fr: - Bien sûr que non. - Nous serons heureux de vous accueillir.

translation.en: Let him buy you the ring, Lena.
translation.fr: Laissez-le vous faire ce plaisir, Lena.

translation.en: Is that okay?
- Are you sure? No... - Yes... Of course.
translation.fr: - Tu en dis quoi ? - Je veux bien.

translation.en: Let's dance!
- Yes? - Mr. Knippenberg?
Yes, Lawana?
Uh, what time did the others leave?
translation.fr: À quelle heure les autres sont partis ?

translation.en: That long, huh?
It's just this gentleman, Mr. Hilgers,
translation.fr: J'ai reçu un courrier de M. Hilgers.

translation.en: is asking for help in locating his sister- in- law Helena Dekker
translation.fr: Il nous demande de l'aide pour retrouver sa belle-sœur, Helena Dekker

translation.en: and Willem Bloem, her boyfriend.
translation.fr: et Willem Bloem, son petit ami.

translation.en: To help us, he also enclosed an accompanying package
translation.fr: À cette fin, il nous a fait parvenir un paquet

translation.en: of holiday photographs and letters home.
translation.fr: de photos de vacances et de lettres.

translation.en: But that package has not arrived.
translation.fr: Mais le paquet n'est pas arrivé.

translation.en: How can we help find them if we've lost their damn photographs?
translation.fr: Comment faire si on a perdu ces satanées photos ?

translation.en: Perhaps if you left it with me?
Of course.
What do they say, Yotin?
They talk about the Communists, sir.
In Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia.

translation.en: They ask if Thailand might also fall to revolution.

translation.en: Well, it might improve the traffic.
translation.fr: Si ça peut fluidifier la circulation.

translation.en: Jasmine, sir?
No, thank you.
Goddamnit.
Yotin, it started at 4:00 and it's already quarter past.

translation.en: Surely it would be quicker to walk? This is Athidhaya Road.
translation.fr: Je vais marcher. On est sur Athidhaya.

translation.en: The athletic club is only three or four blocks north.
translation.fr: Le country club n'est plus très loin.

translation.en: - But Mr. Knippenberg-- - I can't just sit here.
translation.fr: - M. Knippenberg… - Je ne peux pas attendre.

translation.en: - Oh. S- Sorry. -
- Herman! - Hi.
Are you all right?
Ambassador. I'm sorry, the traffic was unbelievable.
translation.fr: Excusez-moi, j'étais bloqué dans les embouteillages.

translation.en: We didn't move a yard in 30 minutes, and the rain...
translation.fr: On n'avançait pas et puis, la pluie…

translation.en: This is Knippenberg, my Third Secretary.
Knippenberg, this is Giles Easton, my opposite number with the British.
translation.fr: Je vous présente Giles Easton, mon homologue anglais.

translation.en: - How do you do? How do you do? - Good afternoon.
- Good shot! - Ambassador, may I speak with you--
translation.fr: - Bien joué ! - Puis-je vous parler de…

translation.en: That is Mrs. Knippenberg.
I told Angela to play with De Jongh. As you were late.
translation.fr: J'ai demandé à Angela de jouer avec De Jongh, vu votre retard.

translation.en: - You didn't tell me she was learning Thai. - Did I not?
translation.fr: - J'ignorais qu'elle apprenait le thaï. - Ah ?

translation.en: To add to the four or five other languages she already speaks.
translation.fr: Elle qui maîtrise déjà quatre ou cinq langues.

translation.en: If she wasn't German, I'd offer her a job!
translation.fr: Si elle n'était pas allemande, je l'embaucherais !

translation.en: Well, if you weren't Dutch, I might take it.
translation.fr: Si vous n'étiez pas hollandais, j'accepterais.

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, may I speak with you briefly on a consular matter?
translation.fr: M. l'ambassadeur, puis-je vous parler d'une affaire consulaire ?

translation.en: I thought the office was shut.
Yes, no, of course, but I thought this was rather urgent.
translation.fr: Si, bien sûr, mais il s'agit d'une affaire urgente.

translation.en: Two young Dutch backpackers.
Their families haven't heard from them in over two months.
translation.fr: Leurs familles sont sans nouvelles depuis deux mois.

translation.en: Knippenberg, when did you last speak to your mother?
And does she write letters declaring you missing?

translation.en: It's not a diplomat's job to go chasing after longhair bums.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas votre boulot de retrouver des hippies.

translation.en: If it's for anyone, it's for the Thai police.
Pass it on to them if you're so concerned.
translation.fr: Allez leur en parler, si ça vous tracasse.

translation.en: Yes, sir, of course, Ambassador.
Oh, good shot.
Once again, a Dutch triumph over you Brits.
translation.fr: Une nouvelle victoire des Hollandais sur les Anglais.

translation.en: Yes, please!
Hey, Herman.
Congratulations.
- Hello. - What was all that?
It's, uh, two missing Dutch.
Worried family. But it's a police matter, apparently.
translation.fr: La famille est inquiète. Mais je dois laisser faire la police.

translation.en: My mother warned me about this.
He takes his work too seriously.
translation.fr: Il prend son travail trop au sérieux.

translation.en: He will never take the day off to make love to you
translation.fr: Jamais il ne te proposera de te faire l'amour

translation.en: on the 15th floor of the Siam Point.
Well, it only has eight floors, so technically, she was correct.
translation.fr: Il n'y a que huit étages, alors elle n'a pas tort.

translation.en: Why are you writing that? Alain said we could stay at his place.

translation.en: It's too much. Too generous.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas accepter, voyons.

translation.en: But Alain is expecting us.
We can go and see them later.

translation.en: Wim!
Lena?
Is it you?
Yeah.
I'm Ajay.
- Alain sent me. I work for him. - How did you know it was us?

translation.en: Well, there's the orange.
But, really... that, of course.
translation.fr: Et puis, grâce à ça, évidemment.

translation.en: Let me help you with your bags. We're all expecting you.
translation.fr: Donnez-moi vos sacs. Vous êtes attendus.

translation.en: We were planning on going to the Santa Cruz first?

translation.en: The Santa Cruz?
No. Alain wouldn't allow it. Not for his friends.
translation.fr: Alain ne laisserait pas ses amis loger là-bas.

translation.en: That place gets worse by the week.
The bathwater comes straight out of the klong.
translation.fr: L'eau des robinets est pompée dans les canaux.

translation.en: People get robbed.
- We don't want to go to the-- - No.
Welcome to Bangkok. Come on, then.
Look who I found.
- Hey. Welcome. - Lena!
You made it.
- Nice to see you. - You too. Welcome.
translation.fr: - Ravie de te revoir. - Moi aussi. Bienvenue.

translation.en: - Welcome to Kanit House. - Thank you very much.
- How was the trip? - Yeah, it was good.
translation.fr: - Vous avez fait bon voyage ? - Oui.

translation.en: This is Frankie.
- Our friend Dominique. - Bonjour.
- This is for you. For you. - Thank you.
translation.fr: - Voilà pour toi et pour toi. - Merci.

translation.en: - Fresh towel. - Well, thank you very much.
translation.fr: - Des serviettes pour vous rafraîchir. - C'est gentil.

translation.en: It's really good.
Here, I'll take your bag for you.
Come on. We'll wash your dirty things for you.

translation.en: - But it's all dirty. - Then we'll wash it all.
translation.fr: - Tout est sale. - On lavera tout.

translation.en: Won't we, Dominique?
Yes, Alain.
Thanks for not listening to me.
translation.fr: Merci de ne pas m'avoir écoutée.

translation.en: Now, wash, rest. Make yourself at home.
translation.fr: Rafraîchissez-vous, reposez-vous. Faites comme chez vous.

translation.en: I'm calling from the Dutch Embassy on behalf of Herman Knippenberg.
translation.fr: J'appelle depuis l'ambassade des Pays-Bas de la part d'Herman Knippenberg.

translation.en: I'd like to talk to someone concerning a missing persons enquiry.
translation.fr: J'aimerais parler à quelqu'un au sujet d'une double disparition.

translation.en: I am very sorry, Mr. Knippenberg,
but the police ask us to call back after the holiday.
translation.fr: La police demande à ce qu'on rappelle après les fêtes.

translation.en: - But that's three days. - Lawana!
- Okay, Lawana, you can go. - Sir.
translation.fr: - Vous pouvez rentrer chez vous, Lawana. - Bien.

translation.en: Knippenberg, you've passed that business onto the police?
translation.fr: Knippenberg, vous avez transmis le dossier à la police ?

translation.en: Yes, Ambassador.
Just this moment.
Belgium.
Oh, Mr. Siemons? It's Herman Knippenberg.
translation.fr: M. Siemons ? Herman Knippenberg à l'appareil.

translation.en: I sit on the Intergovernmental Narcotics Liaison with you.
translation.fr: Je siège au bureau de liaison des stupéfiants avec vous.

translation.en: - Which one are you? - Excuse me?
- Nation! - Oh! Dutch.
I believe the Belgian Embassy
translation.fr: Je crois que l'ambassade de Belgique vous demande

translation.en: also asks you to manage its more irregular problems.
translation.fr: Je crois que l'ambassade de Belgique vous demande de gérer divers problèmes épineux.

translation.en: And what can I do for you, my clog- wearing friend?
translation.fr: Que puis-je pour vous, mon ami aux gros sabots ?

translation.en: You know they're not technically your problem?
translation.fr: Cette affaire n'est pas de votre ressort.

translation.en: Yes. The Ambassador says to phone the police,
translation.fr: L'ambassadeur m'a dit de contacter la police,

translation.en: but they're on holiday.
Yeah, I'll bet they are.
Are you eating?
Soup?
No soup.
They expect great things of you, I imagine.
translation.fr: On attend beaucoup de vous, j'imagine.

translation.en: Pardon me?
- You have a master's degree? - Yes.
Advanced International Studies.
Taken at Johns Hopkins, Bologna and Washington.
translation.fr: J'ai étudié à Johns Hopkins, Bologne et Washington.

translation.en: - You did well? - Yes. A distinction.

translation.en: And now you want to fuck it all up?
Good for you!
- Now, you want to find them? - Well, yes.
Then pay attention.
First, did they even get here?
If they did, there will be documentation. Landing cards.
translation.fr: Ils auront laissé des traces. Cartes de débarquement.

translation.en: They definitely arrived, sir.
translation.fr: Ils sont bien arrivés au pays.

translation.en: Check the major Poste Restantes.
These young travelers rely on them for news from home.
translation.fr: Ces globe-trotteurs y font parvenir leur courrier.

translation.en: So, check if they pick up any letters.
translation.fr: Allez voir s'ils en ont récupéré.

translation.en: I thought the Ambassador told you to pass it on to the police?
translation.fr: L'ambassadeur t'a pourtant dit de confier ça à la police.

translation.en: It's just one phone call.
What do you think?
Well, I think it's disobedient.
I don't speak the language, Angela.

translation.en: Do you have any letters for Willem Bloem or Helena Dekker?
translation.fr: Avez-vous du courrier adressé à Willem Bloem ou Helena Dekker ?

translation.en: Six for Bloem from Amsterdam.
Yes, there are letters.
He never collected them?
Did you ever hear of this place?
Santa Cruz Hotel.
It's one of those traveler hostels.
It's where I go to buy your pot.
- I don't smoke pot. -
translation.fr: Je ne fume pas de joints.

translation.en: Come.
- Hello. - Who are you, man?
I wonder if you might help me. I work for the Dutch embassy.

translation.en: I'm looking for two people.
A Miss Helena Dekker
and a Mr. Willem Bloem.
Here on their landing cards it says Santa Cruz Hotel.

translation.en: I wonder if you could look to see if they checked in?

translation.en: It should be December 11th or 12th.
translation.fr: Ça doit remonter au 11 ou 12 décembre.

translation.en: They were never here, man.
See for yourself.
Hey, Company Man! Are you done? Or do you need a xerox?

translation.en: Thank you.
So they arrived in Bangkok,
but never made it to the hotel.

translation.en: Where did they go?
Perhaps they didn't stick to their schedule, Company Man.

translation.en: Sorry. I just got in.
- Bad jet lag. - No hassle, man.

translation.en: How long are you staying?
Um... I'm heading to Nepal tomorrow.
Oh. That's cool.
Do you want to split a room maybe? Might be cheaper.

- All right. - Okay, cool.
Two.
- Hey, what's your name? - Teresa.
Teresa?
Oh, no. No, thanks.
Hey, you're not a Jesus freak, are you?

translation.en: No.
Why Nepal if you don't smoke hash?

translation.en: Kathmandu is still freak Nirvana.

Why get high, Celia?
I mean, isn't all this a little bit of a trip already?

translation.en: This is...
Maybe you should keep it.
- Do you want it? - Yes, I do.

translation.en: Seriously, maybe you're, like, my spirit guide or something.

Well, your spirit guide needs a fucking drink.

Follow your spirit guide.
Follow me.
- Hey. - Hi.
- I'm Ajay. - Celia.

translation.en: - You two are friends? - Yeah.
Hey, there's a party, you guys should both come.

translation.en: Hip, you know? Not like the tourists here.

There's a pool. Bring your bikinis and we can have a swim.

- Celia... - Yeah?
- Let me tell you where I'm headed. - Yeah?

translation.en: I'm going to a Buddhist monastery.
I was there a year ago and I'm going back, but to live.
translation.fr: J'y étais l'an dernier et j'y retourne pour m'y établir.

translation.en: What? Like a nun?
Not like. Actually a nun.

translation.en: and I want to do them now.
What, with that guy?
- If you're sure. Okay. - Hey, you're amazing.

translation.en: So are you. So are you, hon.
- Erm, okay, cool, well, have fun. - I'll see you...
- Yeah. - Maybe.
Welcome back. What's your name?
Oh, just some shit.
Some shit. Great.
I did everything you said, Paul. Wim Bloem and Lena Dekker
translation.fr: QUATRE MOIS PLUS TARD Wim Bloem et Lena Dekker

translation.en: landed in Bangkok but never checked in to their--

translation.en: Oi, Siemons! Who's your girlfriend?

translation.fr: - Laver. Pour l'Australie. - Laver, comme le joueur de tennis ?

translation.en: Nothing like, mate. More's the fucking pity.
translation.fr: Rien à voir. C'est bien dommage.

translation.en: - Nippenberg from the Dutch. - It's Knippenberg.
How long you got left, Ker- nippenberg?

translation.en: - Left? - Before you go home?
Quite some time. We only arrived six months ago.
translation.fr: Encore un moment. On est là depuis six mois.

Jesus. Good luck with that.
Knippenberg has lost a couple of longhairs
translation.fr: Knippenberg a perdu un couple de hippies,

Peace and love, right, Knippenberg?

They're work- shy hobos, mate.
I disagree. What they do is hard work.

translation.en: no air- conditioning, no drivers.
Let's get them all a fucking medal, shall we?

translation.en: Living in Squalor Medal.
Gentlemen. My apologies.
If you'll excuse me for one moment?

translation.en: Your friends are not welcome here.

translation.en: Let's move over here.
I'll tell you a story about longhairs.
It's a good story, once you get to the end.

translation.en: I had a pair of murder victims

translation.en: on a Thai cop mortuary slab.

On their fucking hippy trip.
They'd been killed, set on fire,
their faces disfigured.
They found them in a ditch 58 Ks south of the old city at Ayutthaya.

translation.en: You got to wait to the end, don't you?
You ever go to bed with two women at the same time?

Asshole.

He's worried about the curfew.
Right. Aren't you?
I'm staying right here till morning.
See it through with me, Cloggy.
- Sorry, Paul. -
Mr. Laver, your story about the two Australian travelers?

translation.en: Johnson and Rosanna Watson.
- That was their names? - That's who the cops thought they were.
translation.fr: - C'était leurs noms ? - C'est ce que la police en a conclu.

translation.en: - - But they weren't?
Told you it was a good story.
translation.fr: C'est une bonne histoire, tu vois.

translation.en: So your bodies, you still have no names for them?
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas identifié vos victimes ?

translation.en: No! Not mine. Not my bodies.
Not any more, mate. That's someone else's problem.
- Whose? - Whose what?
Whose problem are the two unidentified bodies?
translation.fr: Qui ça regarde, ces corps non identifiés ?

translation.en: Whose bloody murder case is it?
Hey! Keep your hair on, you little fucking mouse with clogs on.
translation.fr: Du calme, espèce de lèche-bottes à sabots.

translation.en: It's the Western District Division.
translation.fr: La police de la division occidentale.

translation.en: No, wait! Eastern.
- Eastern Division. You're sure? - Sure as eggs, mate.
And the Australian couple, where are they now?
What I've been trying to tell you, mate.
translation.fr: C'est ce que j'essaie de te dire, mec.

translation.en: They just showed up.
They've been on some island living on coconuts and fish heads.
translation.fr: Ils étaient sur une île déserte à vivre de noix de coco et de pêche.

translation.en: Stupid fucking hippies.
translation.fr: Ces putains de bandes de hippies.

translation.en: Let's go for this one.
Excellent choice.
Excuse me, Alain. Have you seen Lena?
translation.fr: Dis-moi, Alain, tu n'as pas vu Lena ?

translation.en: - Pool, I think. - All right, thank you.
translation.fr: - Va voir à la piscine. - Merci.

translation.en: I brought you a beer.
- Thank you. Cheers. - Cheers.
So you are French?
Québécoise. Canada. The French part.
translation.fr: Québécoise. Enfin, canadienne. La région francophone.

translation.en: It's amazing, right?
The friends you make when you're far away from home.
translation.fr: Les amis qu'on se fait loin de chez soi.

translation.en: - It's the best thing about it, I think. - Yes.
So, can I ask how you guys ended up here together?
translation.fr: Comment vous avez atterri ici tous les deux ?

translation.en: I came for a holiday.
But you didn't go home?
I did not.
He made it impossible for me.
translation.fr: Avec lui, je ne pouvais plus partir.

translation.en: Hello, Wim.
- Sleep well? - Yeah, like a child.
translation.fr: - Tu as bien dormi ? - Comme un bébé.

translation.en: And you two?
We were just friends.
You two are going to get married, yes?
Well, she's not marrying anyone else, that's for sure.
translation.fr: Elle n'en épousera pas un autre, c'est certain.

translation.en: Well, you're adorable together.
- Not as romantic as you and Alain. - I want to help you.
Those two stones you just saw me sell?
translation.fr: Ces pierres que tu m'as vues vendre.

translation.en: Two of those you could sell in Amsterdam for 15,000 guilders.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais les revendre à Amsterdam pour 15 000 florins.

translation.en: Lena says she doesn't care about money.
Of course she does. She's young.
And she's a little bit of a hippy.
translation.fr: Elle est un peu hippie sur les bords.

translation.en: But she doesn't face the same challenges you do.
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas confrontée aux mêmes difficultés que toi.

translation.en: I know what it's like, Wim, back in Europe.
translation.fr: Je sais comment ça se passe en Europe.

translation.en: When you're like us.
There's two men applying for the same position,
translation.fr: Quand deux types postulent pour un poste,

translation.en: they take the whitest one.
It happened to my father all the time.
translation.fr: Mon père a connu ça bien souvent.

translation.en: I think every man must one day make a home.
translation.fr: Tout homme doit un jour songer à l'avenir.

translation.en: And say to himself, This is my life,
translation.fr: Et se dire : Voici ma vie,

translation.en: this is my love,
and this is who I am.
But to get there, for men like you and me,
translation.fr: Mais pour y arriver, pour des gens comme nous,

translation.en: we must take our opportunities when they come.
translation.fr: il faut savoir saisir les occasions.

translation.en: Are you sure we should do that?
Yeah, I...
I know they want to help, but...
translation.fr: Je sais qu'ils veulent nous aider, mais…

translation.en: Are they still out there?
Down in the pool.
How much they got?
More than he told me they had.
Oh! Don't you just hate a lie?
translation.fr: Tu n'aimes pas qu'on te mente ?

translation.en: You know, we only want to help.
I know.
Alain thinks you don't understand.
translation.fr: Alain pense que tu ne comprends pas.

translation.en: I do understand.
He wants us to buy the gems
translation.fr: Il veut qu'on achète les pierres

translation.en: and sell them for twice what we paid when we get home.
translation.fr: et qu'on les revende le double aux Pays-Bas.

translation.en: You don't think that's a good idea?
The money will give you a good start,
translation.fr: Cet argent vous donnerait un bon départ,

translation.en: a nice life.
- In any case, we really can't afford it. - I don't believe you.
translation.fr: - On ne peut pas se le permettre. - Je ne te crois pas.

translation.en: Please, Lena...
just buy the gems.
- Taxi for Knippenberg! - You took your bloody time.
translation.fr: - Ton taxi est là ! - Tu as mis le temps.

translation.en: - - It's almost curfew.
Scheisse, Herman!
You know, anytime you want to learn to drive,
I'll entirely support that decision.
You can call Yotin if you want someone to bark at.
translation.fr: Prends-t'en à Yotin la prochaine fois.

translation.en: I can't call Yotin.
No one at the Embassy can know what we're about to do.
translation.fr: Personne ne doit être mis au courant.

translation.en: What if we're caught? If you're caught?
translation.fr: Et si on se fait prendre ? Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: What? Stern rebuke?
Or the chop?
It's very cold in Holland right now, Herman.
translation.fr: Il fait très froid aux Pays-Bas.

translation.en: Have you thought about that?
Yeah. Have you?
Where to?
The police station. Eastern Division.
translation.fr: Au commissariat de la division orientale.

translation.en: A monkey! Oh, my God.
Who is your guest, Ajay?
Hey, I'm Teresa.
- Monique. It's her place. - Oh, um, you're the gem dealer.
translation.fr: - On est chez Monique. - La négociante en pierres précieuses.

translation.en: I am not. He is the gem dealer.
translation.fr: Non, c'est lui, le négociant en pierres précieuses.

translation.en: My husband Alain.
You live with these guys?
- Yeah, they are cool. - You want to dance?
translation.fr: - Oui, ils sont super. - Tu danses ?

translation.en: No, I don't dance.
Soon as it starts ringing, I've gotta go.
translation.fr: Quand le réveil sonnera, je devrai partir.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
That's okay.
- How do I say I'm sorry in French? - Um...
translation.fr: Comment on dit désolé en français ?

translation.en: - Je suis désolée? Perfect? - Mm- hmm.
You know, it's crazy but I've never slept with a Frenchman before.
translation.fr: C'est dingue, j'ai jamais couché avec un Français.

translation.en: - So you are Teresa? - I am.
And you are American?
Where are you heading?
Nepal, to a monastery.
If you're going to be a nun,
translation.fr: Si tu comptes entrer dans les ordres,

translation.en: why do you have all these travelers' cheques?
translation.fr: que fais-tu avec ces chèques de voyage ?

translation.en: Well, they're not for me. They're for the monastery.
translation.fr: Ils ne sont pas pour moi, mais pour le monastère.

translation.en: The cost of pursuing Nirvana goes up and up.
translation.fr: La quête du nirvana a la cote.

translation.en: So, you want to renounce the world entirely?
translation.fr: Tu comptes renoncer au monde pour toujours ?

translation.en: No, I don't renounce the world.
translation.fr: Non, je ne renonce pas au monde,

translation.en: Just the people who run it.
translation.fr: mais aux gens qui le dirigent.

translation.en: On my heart, you are too young to lock yourself away.
translation.fr: Tu es trop jeune pour aller te cloîtrer.

translation.en: Too young, too beautiful.
Your life too full of opportunity.
With you, you mean?
Did Ajay tell you what I do?
translation.fr: Ajay t'a parlé de mon affaire ?

translation.en: Yes. It's gems, right?
translation.fr: Tu es dans les pierres précieuses.

translation.en: I buy. I sell. And from time to time, others sell for me.
translation.fr: J'achète, je vends. Parfois, certains vendent pour moi.

translation.en: I am not going to smuggle gemstones for you.
translation.fr: Je ne compte pas faire du trafic de pierres précieuses.

translation.en: - I'm taking vows. - And yet I find you here,
translation.fr: - Je vais prononcer mes vœux. - Pourtant, tu es là,

translation.en: openly offering yourself to my friend Dominique.
translation.fr: à t'offrir ouvertement à mon ami Dominique.

translation.en: I'm not a nun yet.
translation.fr: Je suis pas encore bonne sœur.

translation.en: In which case, may I ask, have you been to...
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, je peux te demander si tu as fréquenté

translation.en: What shall we call them? Nightclubs here?
translation.fr: disons, les boîtes de nuit des alentours ?

translation.en: Oh, you mean the sex shows?
Well?
I have not.
Then on this last night,
before you retreat from the world,
translation.fr: avant de te retirer du monde,

translation.en: perhaps you should.
Oh, my God!
Heartwarming.
I'm gonna go.
Take it easy, Teresa.
Fuck! Fucking idiot.
You think I don't know how a fucking downer comes on?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je reconnais pas les effets ?

translation.en: - Don't touch me! Help! -
translation.fr: Ne me touche pas, toi ! Au secours !

translation.en: He's Alain, he's Ajay! They fucking drugged me!
translation.fr: C'est Alain et Ajay ! Ils m'ont droguée !

translation.en: Get her in the car.
You draw attention to yourself, Teresa.
It's not prudent.
Drank too much.
Help.
Please take it all. Please take it.
translation.fr: Prenez tout mon argent, je vous en prie.

translation.en: - Won't the monastery miss it? -
You fucking asshole.
You're vulgar.
You throw yourself at men the way you throw yourself at religion.
translation.fr: Tu te jettes au cou des hommes comme dans la religion.

translation.en: You cannot buy your way off the wheel, Teresa.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas te racheter une conscience.

translation.en: It is very American of you to think otherwise.
translation.fr: C'est très américain de penser le contraire.

translation.en: And as you may know,
Americans do not prosper in this part of the world.
translation.fr: les Américains ne font pas fortune dans ces contrées.

translation.en: - Fuck you. - Hey, where are we going?
translation.fr: - Je t'emmerde. - Où est-ce qu'on va ?

translation.en: Aren't we leaving her at the Santa Cruz?
translation.fr: On la ramène au Santa Cruz ?

translation.en: Where shall we leave her?
She's seen too much.
And you saw, she's not afraid to complain.
translation.fr: Elle serait prête à nous dénoncer.

translation.en: She will only be another reckless Westerner
who took drugs and went swimming.
translation.fr: qui s'est droguée et s'est noyée.

translation.en: Once, I stole a taxi in Peshawar.
translation.fr: Un jour, j'ai volé un taxi à Peshawar.

translation.en: I had to take it to Tehran, you see?
translation.fr: Je devais le conduire jusqu'à Téhéran.

translation.en: The driver refused so I had to dose him.
translation.fr: Le chauffeur était récalcitrant, alors, j'ai dû le droguer.

translation.en: I put him in the trunk...
translation.fr: Je l'ai mis dans le coffre

translation.en: and after some time,
he awoke and began to moan and thump.
translation.fr: il s'est réveillé et s'est mis à gémir et à cogner.

translation.en: It was upsetting the other passengers,
translation.fr: Ce qui perturbait les autres passagers.

translation.en: so I stopped at a river to check on him.
translation.fr: Je me suis arrêté près d'un fleuve pour voir comment il allait.

translation.en: But he had suffocated,
so I took him out and helped him into the water.
translation.fr: alors je l'ai sorti de là, et je l'ai mis à l'eau.

translation.en: I expected to feel great guilt,
but I did not,
translation.fr: mais ce ne fut pas le cas.

translation.en: I felt free.
Free from judgment.
Mine.
God's.
It was all entirely...
without tragedy.
Did they come looking for you? Did they catch you?
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'on s'en est pris à toi ? Tu t'es fait coincer ?

translation.en: Nobody has ever caught me, Ajay. No one.
translation.fr: Personne ne m'a jamais coincé, Ajay. Jamais personne.

translation.en: We can do it together.
Are you gonna hurt me?
translation.fr: Tu vas me faire du mal ?

translation.en: No. Better than that.
Oh, compassionate ones.
This person is going from this world
to the other shore.
She is leaving this world.
translation.fr: Elle part pour le grand voyage.

translation.en: She is dying without choice.
translation.fr: Elle va mourir, elle n'a pas le choix.

translation.en: She has no friends.
She is suffering greatly.
She has no refuge.
She has no protector.
She has no allies.
The light of this life has set.
translation.fr: La lumière de cette vie s'éteint.

translation.en: She is embarking on a great battle.
translation.fr: Elle est projetée en avant dans une grande bataille.

translation.en: She is seized by the great evil spirit.
translation.fr: Elle est saisie par un grand démon.

translation.en: She is terrified by the messengers
translation.fr: Elle est terrifiée par les messagers

translation.en: of the Lord of Death.
She is entering existence after existence.
translation.fr: Quittant une existence, elle s'engage dans une autre.

translation.en: Because of her karma, she is helpless.
The time has come when she must go alone
translation.fr: Maintenant que le temps est venu, il lui faut partir seule

translation.en: without a friend.
- - Lena. Shh.
Are those dead bodies?
Yes. Burned, I think.
What's wrong with us?
Monique? Please.
And the remains of their clothing.
Look!
My God.
It's them.
- Alain, please help us. - Shh.
translation.fr: Alain, tu dois nous aider, je t'en prie.

translation.en: Why has no one done anything?
